rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A minimalist Scandinavian design entrance with polished concrete floors and ample natural light. Vastu compliant by placing the main door in the south-east direction.

rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A spacious area combining living space with an open-plan kitchen featuring sleek cabinetry and neutral tones. Large windows on the east side for balanced light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom includes built-in storage solutions and a Scandinavian aesthetic with minimalistic furniture and earthy hues. West-facing window for optimal energy flow as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A versatile guest bedroom that maintains simplicity and functional design. Adequate natural light from east side windows to enhance serenity.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact yet comfortable living space for the servant, including a small kitchenette and bathroom. Designed with Scandinavian minimalism in mind.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entryway door following Vastu principles to welcome positive energy, complemented by Scandinavian design elements.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: A modern glass window offering outdoor access and fresh air while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining area for the bachelor pad, designed with Scandinavian simplicity and a focus on comfort.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A functional home office space integrating Scandinavian design principles with ample natural light from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with minimal fixtures and a monochromatic palette, ensuring both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: A well-designed staircase connecting ground and first floor, crafted with wood finishes typical of Scandinavian interiors.
